attributes.action: Give people on low income the same benifits when it comes to road tax as the elderly get
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a mother of 3 and struggle with most my bills i work part time and bring just enough money home to pay my way, with the exception of my road tax which is stupidly high! I think people on low income should get the same rights as the elderly when it comes to road tax, in most cases the elderly get more money then someone working partime, and are much better off then a young working family, the system is all wrong and needs sorting out to help everyone not just the elderly
